game.name: LXD Red Honey
game.desc:
Liquid Xtal Dream. A strange machine appeared in the sky, breaking down much of the plant life across the region into their core elements, including your humble garden. Collect and harness the power of these fragments in order to rebuild your world piece by piece. Explore 6 unique areas in order to find and defeat the evil that sought your world's destruction.
Made in 18 Days for Metroidvania Month 24.
